title: Dwarven Toughness
content:
Dwarven Toughness Effect Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again every time you gain a level. Requirements Gold Dwarf Lvl 1

Dwarven Toughness

Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again every time you gain a level.

Gold Dwarf Lvl 1

Dwarven Toughness is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
